rules_text:
Haste
When Lady of Fire enters, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures in your sentai. [i](A sentai is up to one creature of each color.)[/i]
notes:
SMALL creature CMC 1

DISTRIBUTE THESE KEYWORDS AMONGST RED COMMON CREATURES (Additional keywords fine): Menace, Haste, DMG Opponent, Trample, Rummage, First Strike
